introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is どういつ, which you will often hear in situations where you need to describe or verify something as being exactly the same as another. Imagine the confidence you'll gain in everyday conversations by mastering this essential term!
meaning_explanation_english: The word 同一 (どういつ) means "the same" or "identical" in English. It is used to describe something that is not different from another in nature, quality, or form.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 同様 : どうよう : same
等しい : ひとしい : equal
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the 同一 are 同様 and 等しい. 同様 means similar or alike, implying that things resemble each other in a broad sense. 等しい translates to equal, focusing more on parity and being exactly equivalent.
antonyms: 異なる : ことなる : to differ
違う : ちがう : to differ
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of the 同一 are 異なる and 違う. 異なる means different and refers to a broader variation or difference that distinguishes things. 違う implies a disparity or deviation from what is expected or usual, indicating something is unlike or mismatched.

collocations.kanji: どういつの考えをもつ
collocations.furigana: どういつの考えをもつ

example_sentences.kanji: 同一の帽子をかぶっています。
example_sentences.furigana: 同一(どういつ)の帽子(ぼうし)をかぶっています。

translations.EN: We are wearing the same hat.
translations.VI: Chúng tôi đang đội cùng một chiếc mũ.
translations.MY: ကျွန်ုပ်တို့ဟာ အပေါက်တချို့ကိုတင်ထားကြပါတယ်။
translations.HI: हम एक ही टोपी पहन रहे हैं।

example_sentences.furigana: この色(いろ)は同一(どういつ)である。

translations.MY: ဒီအရောင်ဟာ တစ်ခုခြင်းပါ။

example_sentences.kanji: あの犬とこの犬は同一に見える。
example_sentences.furigana: あの犬(いぬ)とこの犬(いぬ)は同一(どういつ)に見(み)える。

translations.EN: That dog and this dog look identical.
translations.ID: Anjing itu dan anjing ini terlihat sama.
translations.ES: Ese perro y este perro parecen idénticos.
translations.VI: Con chó đó và con chó này trông giống hệt nhau.
translations.FR: Ce chien et ce chien semblent identiques.
translations.NE: यो कुकुर र त्यो कुकुर उस्तै देखिन्छन्।
translations.BN: ওই কুকুরটি এবং এই কুকুরটি একই রকম দেখাচ্ছে।
translations.ZH: 那只狗和这只狗看起来一样。
translations.KO: 저 개와 이 개는 동일해 보인다.
translations.TL: Ang asong iyon at ang asong ito ay mukhang magkatulad.
translations.MY: အန့်နဲ့ ဒီခွေးက အတူတူဘဲ.
translations.HI: वह कुत्ता और यह कुत्ता एक जैसे दिखते हैं।
translations.AR: ذلك الكلب وهذا الكلب يبدوان متطابقين.
translations.FA: آن سگ و این سگ یکسان به نظر می‌رسند.

example_sentences.kanji: 私たちは同一の考えを持つ。
example_sentences.furigana: 私(わたし)たちは同一(どういつ)の考え(かんがえ)を持(も)つ。

translations.VI: Chúng tôi có cùng ý tưởng.
translations.MY: ကျွန်ုပ်တို့သည်တူညီသောအတွေးအခေါ်ရှိသည်။

parts_of_speech: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Na-adjective (keiyodoshi)
Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Na-adjective (keiyodoshi)
